RaidSkill.DescEn: Deals 120% damage to enemies in a straight line.
Deals <?1> damage to 4 enemies.
Deals 300% damage to all enemies and decreases their <d:DEF> by 50% for 30s.
Decreases all enemies' <d:HIT> by 20% and <d:Stability> by 50%. This debuff cannot be removed.

RaidSkill.NameJp: 玉座への喚び声は此処にありて
RaidSkill.DescEn:
Summons automaton soldiers. Chesed's ATG gauge gradually fills while soldiers are alive and resets after all soldiers have been defeated. Automaton soldiers also increase Chesed's groggy gauge <?1>when defeated.
If not killed within 20s, automaton soldiers will use the skill "Self-Destruct Activated", changing their <s:FormChange> to a self-destruct attack that deals 3000% damage to enemies in a circular area around them.
Parameters: and spawn a Sweeper

RaidSkill.NameJp: 至高の権能を目撃せよ
RaidSkill.DescEn: When Chesed's ATG gauge is half filled, increases the <b:AttackSpeed> and <b:MoveSpeed> of all remaining automaton soldiers by 50% for 60s.

RaidSkill.NameJp: 王は慈悲を施すものなり
RaidSkill.DescEn: When ATG gauge is full, deals 2000% damage to all enemies.

Immune to all effects that decrease <d:DamagedRatio>.
When Chesed's groggy gauge is full, reveals Chesed's core and decreases <d:DamagedRatio> by 90% (increasing incoming damage by 900%) for 20s.
Places bombs that explode after a short while and deal <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area. Damage and number of bombs placed increases as Shiro's ATG gauge increases.<?2>
Parameters: Also places ice bombs that additionally decrease <d:MoveSpeed> of enemies hit by 80% for 40s.

RaidSkill.DescEn:
Summons a rolling bomb that deals <?1> damage to enemies in a straight line.<?2>
The bomb deals 300% damage to obstacles in its path. If an obstacle is hit but not destroyed, the bomb will bounce in the opposite direction towards Shiro, increasing her groggy gauge by a significant amount<?3>.
Parameters: If an enemy with decreased is hit, deals an additional 600,000 damage.
and decreasing her <d:DamagedRatio> by 50% for 40s

RaidSkill.DescEn:
Summons theme park rides that deals <?1> damage to enemies in a straight line.<?2>
If Kuro is hit by this attack herself, increases Kuro's groggy gauge by a significant amount<?3>.
Parameters: If an enemy with decreased is hit, deals an additional 600,000 damage.
and decreases her <d:DamagedRatio> by 50% for 40s

RaidSkill.NameJp: アパシー・シンドローム（クロ）
RaidSkill.DescEn: Deals 100% damage to enemies and decreases their <d:MoveSpeed> by 80% for 40s.
Decreases all enemies' <d:HealEffectiveness> by 80%. This debuff cannot be removed.
Deals 350% damage to enemies in a circular area. Damage increases by up to 50% the lower the target's current HP.

Inflicts <d:Hieronymus> on one enemy for 10s, continuously dealing 20% damage over time. After 10s, the target will explode dealing 325% damage in a circular area around them. If the target is healed to 100% HP, the curse will be removed.<?1>
Parameters: Also increases the of the curse target by 3,000 for 10s.

RaidSkill.DescEn: Deals 90% damage to enemies in a circular area.
Every 10s, deals <?1> damage to all enemies. If Hieronymus's ATG gauge is full, deals damage to each enemy equal to 1000% of their Max HP.<?2>
Parameters: Also increases all enemies' by 2,000 while making them for 10s.

RaidSkill.DescEn: When a relic is healed to 100% HP, it loses 95% of its HP while decreasing own by 50% for 20s and activates one of the following effects depending on the relic: Green Relic: Decreases Hieronymus's by 22% (increasing incoming damage by 55%) until the end of battle. Effect can stack up to 5 times.
Parameters: Red Relic: Interrupts Hieronymus's currently active skill. If a skill is successfully interrupted, increases Hieronymus's groggy gauge significantly and increases the skill cost recovery speed of up to 4 students by 2500 for 1s.

Red Relic: Interrupts Hieronymus's currently active skill. If a skill is successfully interrupted, increases Hieronymus's groggy gauge significantly and increases the skill cost recovery speed of up to 4 students by 2500 for 1s.

RaidSkill.DescEn: When the purple relic's HP reaches 0%, increases the of all students by 25% but decreases their by 7,000 and decreases Hieronymus's by 1,500. During this effect, students under the effect of have their increased by a further 4,000 for 10s. The purple relic cannot be targeted by normal attacks or basic skills.

RaidSkill.NameJp: 無限回転・SUPER海老マシンガン
RaidSkill.NameEn: Infinite Cycle - Super Shrimp Machine Gun
RaidSkill.DescEn: Right Arm (pink): Deals 400% damage to enemies in a circular area.

RaidSkill.NameJp: 無限回転・HYPER鰯ミサイル
RaidSkill.DescEn: Chest (red): Deals 300% damage to all enemies.

RaidSkill.NameJp: 無限回転・ULTRAお皿シールド
RaidSkill.DescEn: Left Arm (green): Increases by 50%. This buff is removed after taking 10 hits from any EX skill.

RaidSkill.NameJp: 無限回転・MEGA玉子オーバーチャージ
RaidSkill.DescEn: Feet (yellow): Increases by 4,000 for 30s.
Deals 400% damage to all enemies. This attack cannot be blocked or evaded.

RaidSkill.NameJp: 心を燃やせ……まだまだ回れる！
RaidSkill.DescEn: Every 20s, each component of KAITEN FX Mk.0 will activate in the following order: Right Arm (pink), Chest (red), Left Arm (green). When a component is activated, KAITEN FX Mk.0 will gain one of the following effects: Right Arm (pink): Increases by 50%. Chest (red): KAITEN FX Mk.0's EX skills will also inflict for 5s. Left Arm (green): Increases by 1,000. If a total of damage is dealt while a component is active, that component will be destroyed, increasing KAITEN FX Mk.0's groggy gauge significantly and disabling both the component from activating and the corresponding EX skill until the end of battle.
Parameters: and KAITEN FX Mk.0's EX skills will also decrease enemies' by 80% for 30s

RaidSkill.DescEn: Each Kaitenger will periodically activate their personal EX Skill: Red of Zealousness!: Inflicts on all nearby enemies and prevents them from activating EX skills for 10s. Black of Shrewdness!: Deals 300% damage to one enemy and decreases their by 50%. Green of Weekend OT: Deals 350% damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area. Yellow of Passion!: Deals 500% damage to one enemy. Pink of Pure Heart!: Increases all nearby allies' by 6% for 15s.
Decreases the of one enemy by 9,999 for 60s and continuously deals 90% damage to them every 1s for 10s.
Parameters: If the defense reduction debuff is not removed before the end of the skill's duration, deals 250% damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area.

RaidSkill.DescEn: Deals 400% damage to one enemy.

Summons Perorominions<?1>. Perorominions are <s:Immortal> and 100% of the damage taken by them will also be taken by Perorodzilla. If a Perorominion's HP drops below 50%, they will be knocked down, permanently inflicted with <c:Stunned> and allies will no longer prioritise attacking them.<?2>
Parameters: with 110% increased <b:MAXHP>
with up to 3 stacks of 100% increased <b:MAXHP>
Also summons glowing Perorominions which when knocked down, deal 200,000 damage to other Perorominions in a circular area around it.

RaidSkill.DescEn: Absorbs all Perorominions. For every Perorominion that was knocked down, increases Perorodzilla's groggy gauge by a significant amount. When Perorodzilla's groggy gauge is full, summons 5 broken Perorominions with reduced defense, these Perorominions are <s:Immortal> and 100% of the damage taken by them will also be taken by Perorodzilla.
When ATG gauge is full, deals 300% damage to all enemies.
Deals 150% damage to enemies in a circular area<?1>.
Parameters: three times and expands invader pillars' area of effect by one stage

RaidSkill.DescEn: Deals 200% damage to enemies in a straight line.

Summons an Invader Pillar, decreasing the of enemies and allies by 350 in a circular area around it and forcing nearby defense turrets to attack enemies instead of Hod. The pillar's area of effect expands every 15s.
Deals 150% damage to all enemies. If Hod's HP is less than 50%, deals 300% damage and destroys all defense turrets.
Deals 740% damage to all enemies and increases Hod's <b:ATK> by 50% until the end of battle. Effect stacks up to 99 times.

Hod and all summoned Invader Pillars are immune to the effects of crowd-control. However, crowd-control abilities will fill their circular stun gauge proportional to the duration of the effect that would be inflicted. Once the stun gauge reaches a total equivalent to of crowd-control duration, inflicts the following effects: Hod: Decreases by 30% (increasing incoming damage by 300%) for 30s and decrease Hod's ATG gauge. Invader Pillar: Decreases by 60% (increasing incoming damage by 300%) for 30s and reduce the pillar's area of effect by 1 stage.
Parameters: 6s
7s
8s
9s
The amount added to the stun gauge is multiplied by the inflicter's CC power stat.

RaidSkill.DescEn:
Hod and all summoned Invader Pillars have 400% increased <b:CriticalChanceResistPoint>.
Invader Pillars are also immune to the effects of <d:ConcentratedTarget>.

Rules.NameEn: Ally Cost Recovery Decreases after using EX Skills

Rules.DescEn: Decreases all allies' by 60 each time an ally uses their EX skill. Effect stacks up to 99 times and lasts until the end of battle.

Rules.DescJp: こちらの演習は「屋内戦」の形式で行われます。

Rules.DescJp: 敵の防御タイプは「軽装備」です。

Rules.DescJp: 武器種がMTもしくはARの味方の攻撃力が減少します。
Rules.DescEn: Decreases <d:ATK> for all allies who use MT or AR type weapons by 90%.

Rules.NameJp: CC効果の作用時に追加ダメージ
Rules.DescJp: 敵のHPが増加する代わりに、CC効果が敵に作用するたびに追加ダメージを与えられます。
こちらの演習は「屋内戦」の形式で行われます。
Rules.DescEn: This exercise will take place in indoor terrain.

Rules.DescJp: 部隊にサポーター、アタッカー、タンク、ヒーラー、T.Sをそれぞれ1人以上編成すると、味方のコスト回復速度が増加します。
Rules.DescEn: If a team has at least one Supporter, Dealer, Tank, Healer and T.S. student, increases the cost recovery of all allies by 700.

Rules.DescJp: かかしのHPが1秒毎に、最大HPのn%ずつ減少していきます。
Rules.DescEn: The Scarecrow will lose n% of its maximum HP every 1s

RaidSkill.DescJp:
ATGの値がMAXの場合、スキルを使用
攻撃ごとに攻撃力の150%分のダメージと気絶状態を付与（5秒間）
最後の攻撃で攻撃力の300%分のダメージと気絶状態を付与（5秒間）
RaidSkill.DescEn: Deals 150% damage to one enemy and inflicts <c:Stunned> for 5s, 5 times. The final hit of this attack deals 300% damage and inflicts <c:Stunned> for 5s.

RaidSkill.DescJp:
ATGの値がMAXの場合、スキルを使用
直線範囲内の敵に対して、攻撃力の750%分のダメージ
RaidSkill.DescEn: Deals 750% damage to enemies in a straight line.

RaidSkill.DescJp:
ATGの値がMAXの場合、スキルを使用
対象を追跡するミサイルを発射し、攻撃力の750%分のダメージ
（ミサイルは他の生徒、召喚物、遮蔽物によって遮られることがあります）
RaidSkill.DescEn: Launches a missile that targets the furthest enemy away and deals 750% damage on contact. The missile can be blocked by other students, summons or cover.

RaidSkill.DescJp:
ワカモのスキルで攻撃された対象はワカモの刻印状態になる。
ワカモの刻印が5枚貯まると、該当の対象は最大HPの1000%分のダメージが適用されます。
RaidSkill.DescEn:
Wakamo's EX skills will additionally inflict one stack of <s:SuddenDeath> to the target.
If the target accumulates 5 stacks, they will be dealt damage equal to 1000% of their maximum HP.

RaidSkill.DescJp:
60秒毎に、以下の効果を自身にすべて適用（計3段階）
攻撃力：30%/60%/90%増加
会心値：35%/70%/105%増加
被ダメージ量：10%/20%/50%増加
ATG回復速度：15%/30%/80%増加
RaidSkill.DescEn: Every 60s, gains a stacking increase to <b:ATK> by 30%/60%/90%, <b:CriticalChance> by 35%/70%/105% and ATG recovery speed by 15%/30%/80%, but decrease to <d:DamagedRatio> by 10%/20%/50% at 1/2/3 (max.) stacks respectively.

WorldRaid.NameJp: ワカモ（ホバークラフト）

RaidSkill.DescJp: 最大で敵8人に対して、順番にそれぞれ攻撃力の70%分のダメージ
RaidSkill.DescEn: Deals 70% damage to up to 8 enemies.

RaidSkill.DescJp: 最大で敵2人に対して、順番にそれぞれ攻撃力の250%分のダメージ
RaidSkill.DescEn: Deals 250% damage to up to 2 enemies.

RaidSkill.DescJp:
ATGの値がMAXの場合、リゾートを破壊するためにミサイル暴走モードに突入
リゾートが破壊されると敗北します。
ミサイル暴走モード中、ホバークラフトは不死身状態になります。
ミサイル暴走モードが終了すると、ホバークラフトに故障が発生し、グロッキー状態になります。
グロッキー状態の間、被ダメージ量が200%増加/会心抵抗値が100%減少
RaidSkill.DescEn:
When ATG is full, the hovercraft enters missile mode and begins targeting the resort. During missile mode, the hovercraft is <s:Immortal>.
After missile mode ends, fills the hovercraft's groggy gauge to the maximum and decreases <d:DamagedRatio> by 100% (increasing incoming damage by 200%) and <d:CriticalChanceResistPoint> by 100%. If the resort is destroyed, the battle is immediately lost.

RaidSkill.DescJp:
円形範囲内の敵に対して、攻撃力の450%分のダメージ
このミサイルを破壊すると、敵のストライカー、スペシャル生徒全体に対して攻撃力が400増加
RaidSkill.DescEn: Deals 450% damage to enemies in a circular area. If this missile is destroyed, increases all students' by 400.

RaidSkill.DescJp:
円形範囲内の敵に対して、攻撃力の450%分のダメージ
このミサイルを破壊すると円形範囲内のミサイル全体に対して、999999のダメージ
RaidSkill.DescEn: Deals 450% damage to enemies in a circular area. If this missile is destroyed, deals 999,999 to all other missiles in a circular area.

RaidSkill.DescJp:
円形範囲内の敵に対して、攻撃力の1000%分のダメージ
このミサイルを破壊すると円形範囲内のミサイル全体に対して、攻撃力の400%分のダメージ
RaidSkill.DescEn: Deals 1000% damage to enemies in a circular area. If this missile is destroyed, deals 400% damage to all other missiles in a circular area.

RaidSkill.NameJp: ヘルメット団お手製ミサイル
RaidSkill.DescJp:
円形範囲内の敵に対して、攻撃力の450%分のダメージ
このミサイルを破壊すると円形範囲内のミサイル全体に対して、攻撃力の400%分のダメージ
RaidSkill.DescEn: Deals 450% damage to enemies in a circular area. If this missile is destroyed, deals 400% damage to all other missiles in a circular area.
